document_data.mainbody:
Yzleth ( was an awakened snake that made its home in the the Shrine of Fangs alter on the Snout of Omgar in the late 15 century DR.
Yzleth possessed a fair amount of knowledge about the surround lands of Chult. It was familiar with the ancient conflict between Ubtao and Dendar the Night Serpent, as well as the schemes of the terrible yuan-ti warlord Ras Nsi.
Yzleth had a companion snake named Ssura. The two were both devotees of the god Merrshaulk and remained connected to his later of the Shrine of Fangs.
After a troublesome geonid stole the idol of Merrshaulk from the Shrine of Fangs, Tzleth and Ssura compelled passersby to have it retrieved. They offered some of the accumulated knowledge in exchange for its safe return.
